actions.committee: Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Army to acquire, by condemnation proceedings or otherwise, such interests in the oil, gas, coal, or other minerals owned by the Osage Tribe of Indians needed for the Verdigris River and tributaries project, Oklahoma and Kansas, and the project for the Shidler Reservoir, Salt Creek, Oklahoma.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army to acquire such interests in the oil, gas, coal, or other minerals owned by the Osage Tribe of Indians, or held in trust for said tribe, necessary for the construction of the Verdigris River and tributaries flood control project, Oklahoma and Kansas, and the project for the Shidler Reservoir, Salt Creek, Oklahoma.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Army to acquire, by condemnation proceedings or otherwise, such interests in the oil, gas, coal, or other minerals owned by the Osage Tribe of Indians needed for the Verdigris River and tributaries project, Oklahoma and Kansas, and the project for the Shidler Reservoir, Salt Creek, Oklahoma.
